entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
